name: Highborne
description: Accustomed to a life of elegance, opulence, and prestige within the upper echelons of society.

feature.name: Privilege
feature.description: You have advantage on rolls to consort with nobles, negotiate prices, or leverage your reputation to get what you want.

name: Loreborne
description: From a society that favors strong academic or political prowess and highly values knowledge.

feature.name: Well-Read
feature.description: You have advantage on rolls that involve the history, culture, or politics of a prominent person or place.

name: Orderborne
description: From a collective that focuses on discipline or faith, upholding a set of principles that reflect your experience.

feature.name: Dedicated
feature.description: Record three sayings or values your upbringing instilled in you. Once per rest, when you embody one of these principles, you can roll a d20 as your Hope Die.

name: Ridgeborne
description: You've called the rocky peaks and sharp cliffs of the mountainside home, making you sturdy and strong-willed.

feature.name: Steady
feature.description: You have advantage on rolls to traverse dangerous cliffs and ledges, navigate harsh environments, and use your survival knowledge.

name: Seaborne
description: You lived on or near a large body of water, learning to sail and swim in even the most tumultuous waters.

feature.name: Know the Tide
feature.description: When you roll with Fear, place a token on your community card (max equal to your level). You can spend these tokens to gain a +1 bonus to a roll for each token spent.

name: Slyborne
description: From a group that operates outside the law, including all manner of criminals, grifters, and con artists.

feature.name: Scoundrel
feature.description: You have advantage on rolls to negotiate with criminals, detect lies, or find a safe place to hide.

name: Underborne
description: From a subterranean society, recognized for incredible boldness, skill, and feats of engineering.

feature.name: Low-Light Living
feature.description: When you're in an area with low light or heavy shadow, you have advantage on rolls to hide, investigate, or perceive details within that area.

name: Wanderborne
description: You've lived as a nomad, forgoing a permanent home and valuing information, skills, and connections over possessions.

feature.name: Nomadic Pack
feature.description: Add a Nomadic Pack to your inventory. Once per session, you can spend a Hope to pull out a mundane item that's useful to your situation.

name: Wildborne
description: You lived deep within the forest, dedicated to the conservation of your homeland and its fauna.

feature.name: Lightfoot
feature.description: Your movement is naturally silent. You have advantage on rolls to move without being heard.
